function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"International collaboration and control toward preserving public health may be insufficient or ineffective","Impact":"Expanded spread of contagious diseases across borders","Mitigation":"Strengthening international collaboration, implementing effective control measures, and improving public health infrastructure","Technologies":"Global surveillance systems, data sharing platforms, and telemedicine technologies","People":"Global population, travelers, and migrants","Owner":"International organizations, national governments, and health authorities"},{"Description":"Limited studies on the Post-Occupancy Evaluation (POE) of health club facilities","Impact":"Lack of understanding of the effectiveness of current precautionary measures in health club facilities","Mitigation":"Conducting comprehensive POE studies, sharing research findings, and implementing evidence-based measures","Technologies":"Sensor technology, data analytics, and health monitoring systems","People":"Public health researchers, facility managers, and policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, health organizations, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Challenges in evaluating and proposing effective pandemic precautionary measures for health club facilities","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission within health club facilities","Mitigation":"Implementing strict infection control measures, promoting vaccination, and enhancing ventilation systems","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C disinfection, and real-time air quality monitoring systems","People":"Health club members, staff, and visitors","Owner":"Health club management, public health authorities, and facility operators"}]}
